Title: Christmas Special
Plot: Liz participates in a charity program to help underprivileged kids celebrate Christmas. Meanwhile, Jack takes his frustration out on the TGS staff when his plans for a dream holiday vacation away from his overbearing mother are crushed.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Elaine Stritch (Colleen Donaghy), Eshaya Draper (Deshante Glover), Du Kelly (Dude)
